property.name: DefenderBriefing
property.value:
You have been invited by an opposing player to participate in a GROUND TUTORIAL simulation. This scenario is designed to give you and your opponent a realistic, but consequence-free combat experience involving GROUND units (which may include mechs and/or vehicles with possible infantry support). While the maneuvers you make and the weapons you fire will seem just as real and actual combat, any losses you suffer will only be a simulation. Your units will remain in your hangar, undamaged, once the battle is over.

Use this experience as a foundation to help you in future battles, Commander. Good luck!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Simulated Battle: All units returned to hangar undamaged following battle
* Standard Deployment: 83.3% chance combatants will start on opposite sides (16.7% chance of center/edge)

VICTORY CONDITIONS (Stand-Up Fight):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 50% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 125% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in this simulated battle
* Intelligence (Standard Tutorial): +1 Intel (all outcomes)
* Influence (Low): +30 flu (all outcomes)
* Operation Pay (VERY LOW): 2000 BV: ~930 CBills / 4000 BV: ~1,010 CBills / 6000 BV: ~1,090 CBills
* No Loss Penalty: There is no penalty for losing this battle
* No Early Surrender Penalty: There is also no penalty for surrendering early.
* There is no salvage in this operation. All losses are simulated.

***END BRIEFING***
